at the beginning of each end step if a planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control this turn create a n n basecolor zombie creature token
at the beginning of each end step if a planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control this turn cardname deals n damage to each opponent
at the beginning of each end step if you drew two or more cards this turn you may put a quest counter on cardname
at the beginning of each end step remove all depletion counters from cardname
at the beginning of your end step discard your hand
at the beginning of each end step your life total becomes n
at the beginning of each opponent's end step if you didn't lose life this turn you may put a quest counter on cardname damage causes loss of life
at the beginning of each end step discard your hand
